Bash(git commit -m "Create comprehensive prompt database system

Organized library for archiving and reusing AI prompts:

Structure:
- 7 categories (AI Agents, BI, Outreach, Data, Presentations, Content, Research)
- Main README with inventory and quick links
- Template for adding new prompts

Initial Prompts (3):
1. BI Comprehensive Individual Report (Sarah Gaul example)
2. PE Target Sourcing (Great Range example)
3. PE Pilot Offer Outreach (cold email template)

Each prompt includes:
- Full prompt text with variables
- Example inputs/outputs
- Quality checklist
- Follow-up prompts
- Success metrics
- Related prompts

Future: Add prompts as we create them

ðŸ¤– Generated with Claude Code")

Bash(git commit -m "Add Perplexity Pro MCP server for AI-powered research

Features:
- perplexity_search: Quick AI search with citations
- perplexity_deep_research: Iterative deep-dive analysis
- perplexity_compare: Structured entity comparison

Integration:
- Works with Claude Code via MCP protocol
- Environment variable for API key
- Automated setup script included

Use cases:
- Market research and sizing
- Competitive analysis
- Company background research
- Industry trend analysis

Setup: Run setup.sh, add API key, restart Claude Code

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add WalterFetch macOS native app for lead enrichment

SwiftUI app that provides GUI control over the WalterFetch API:
- Dashboard with job stats and quality tier breakdown
- New job creation with CSV upload or LinkedIn URL import
- Job detail view with progress tracking and lead table
- Chrome debug controls for LinkedIn scraping
- Real-time polling during job execution

Backend API \(walterfetch_api.py\) includes:
- Job/lead CRUD operations
- Web scraping with aiohttp + BeautifulSoup
- Ollama integration for contact extraction
- Chrome DevTools Protocol support for LinkedIn
- Quality tier scoring \(GOLD/SILVER/BRONZE\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
